publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3470# Alex Neil: Census 2001: Depopulation—That the Parliament notes the latest Census 2001 figures which show that Scotland’s population continues to fall; recognises that, unless depopulation is addressed now, there will be severe economic consequences, and believes that a Generation Taskforce should be established to assess what can be done now to solve this problem.
S1M-3470# Census 2001: Depopulation (lodged on 8 October 2002) Christine Grahame*, Bruce Crawford*
S1M-3470# Census 2001: Depopulation (lodged on 8 October 2002) Brian Adam*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3470# Census 2001: Depopulation (lodged on 8 October 2002) Shona Robison*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-3470# Census 2001: Depopulation (lodged on 8 October 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3470# Census 2001: Depopulation (lodged on 8 October 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
